column4: can someone explain this command as found in the chroot thing? sudo sed -i s/dapper/breezy/g /var/chroot/etc/apt/sources.list #point apt-get to the right release
i dont know what that command does
i dont have a clue about it
You need to upgrade to dapper or ordering online to get CD, the breezy change to dapper would go beserked or segfaults..
